A short, very unique game that's centered around making your own portals in order to solve puzzles in different test chambers. The gameplay is great and challenges your intelligence but what makes this game special in my opinion is the story surrounding it. There is lots of lore to be found here that is expanded further upon in it's sequel: Portal 2. Pick this game up if you like brain games and if you don't you can just play for the awesome story alone. There are also some bonus maps you can beat and community mods out there that you can play for an extra challenge if you'd like as well. It's a classic and it set the stage for the next, even better game, Portal 2.

8/10

Muy bueno.

重質不重量的遊戲，介於小品跟一般單機作品之間的的份量，但內容精巧之程度比很多遊戲的完成度都高
操作起來相當直覺，不會有懶覺判定，利用重力把自己往更遠的地方丟的慣性玩法不只新鮮也很令人容易適應這樣的物理法則
氣氛烘托很獨樹一格，雖然整部玩起來多少有一種孤寂感，不過適時的黑色幽默很適合當成推進劇情的佐料
而且做為一代真的很適合入坑，不會有像很多系列作想入坑都只能從最新的一代下手，然後又要擔心跟不上，或者太照顧新手的話作為最新作又有點愧對老粉絲們
關卡設計很循序漸進，很多關卡也很按照個人邏輯可以解開，有趣的是某些關卡似乎解法還不只一種

最後我想說：我可以吃蛋糕了沒？
Short great game. Some of the puzzles actually make you think. Advanced puzzles draw out the best in you.

Classic problem solving game for Xbox and PC's.  The problems are very easy at the beginning (designed that way for those who are unfamiliar with the game), but then becoming increasingly difficult.  Can become frustrating towards the end, but the problems can eventually be solved if you willing to keep trying (and dying).  Surprisingly challenging and intense for a "non-violent" FPS.

As is the case with pretty much every game Valve has ever made, Portal is awesome.
(I know it says I've played only 2.7 hours as of writing this review, but that's because I already knew how to solve every puzzle in the game, and even then it's not very long)

В целом, игра на сегодняшний день проходная: головоломки не сказать, чтоб сложные, да и проходится она за пару часов. Наверное, лучше даже не играть в данную часть, а сразу идти во вторую, ибо так вас даже постигнет меньший диссонанс из-за изменений комплекса во второй части игры. Но и поставить диз я ей не могу, так как это изначально экспериментальная игра, поэтому, скажем так, если вас поистине завлекла серия, то можно окунуться и в первую часть.

yes yes best 545/10

Back in its heyday when it was a developer/publisher first, Valve was the studio that was making genre defining games. Tell me how an experience that can be casually completed in less than four hours has spawned a cult following and status as an instant classic? The Source Engine was dated even when this game came out and yet the game's physics allowed for incredible creativity in the creation of the puzzles and systems that the player interacts with. I have yet to play a more interesting, more engaging action puzzle game since Portal and its successor Portal 2. The lore of the series, arguably more built up in the sequel, is an industry defining example of "show don't tell" that is admirable over a decade later. If you haven't played everything in the Orange Box, do yourself a favor and start with this gem.
